text: Isolona dewevrei is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to the Democratic Republic of the Congo. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Ndjele, M.B. 1998. Isolona dewevrei. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Isolona dewevrei
